experiences.supervisor: Dr. Jane Kim, VP of AI Research
experiences.description: Leading AI research initiatives focused on medical imaging solutions and healthcare applications. Responsible for driving innovation in deep learning models for clinical deployment and establishing research partnerships with medical institutions.
bullets: Led development of AI-powered medical imaging solutions for early cancer detection
Collaborated with medical professionals to validate AI models in clinical settings
Published 3 papers in top-tier conferences (ICML, MICCAI, IEEE TMI)
Mentored 5 junior researchers and supervised 2 master's students
Established partnerships with 3 major hospitals for clinical validation studies
Secured $2.5M in research funding for medical AI projects
achievements: Developed cancer detection model with 94% accuracy, 15% improvement over existing methods
Led team that won Samsung's Innovation Award for Medical AI Solutions
Filed 4 patents in medical image analysis algorithms
Presented research findings at 8 international conferences

experiences.description: Summer research internship focusing on developing novel attention mechanisms for medical image segmentation. Worked within the Health team to advance state-of-the-art medical AI capabilities.
bullets: Developed novel attention mechanisms for medical image segmentation
Improved model accuracy by 15% on benchmark datasets
Presented findings to senior research team and product stakeholders
Collaborated with clinical partners on model validation
Contributed to internal codebase and documentation
achievements: Invention disclosure filed for novel attention architecture
Internship project directly integrated into production system
Invited to present at DeepMind's internal research symposium

experiences.description: Conducted doctoral research on federated learning for healthcare applications while serving as teaching assistant for graduate-level machine learning courses. Developed privacy-preserving algorithms for medical data analysis.
bullets: Conducted research on federated learning for healthcare applications
Developed privacy-preserving algorithms for medical data analysis
Teaching assistant for Machine Learning and Computer Vision courses
Organized weekly research seminars and journal clubs
Mentored 6 undergraduate research students
Published 8 papers in top-tier venues during PhD
achievements: Best Teaching Assistant Award - Computer Science Department
Organized successful ICML workshop on Medical AI (100+ attendees)
Developed federated learning framework adopted by 3 hospitals

experiences.description: Master's research focused on CNN-based image classification for autonomous systems. Developed efficient neural network architectures for real-time processing in resource-constrained environments.
bullets: Developed CNN architectures for autonomous vehicle perception
Optimized models for edge deployment and real-time inference
Collaborated with industry partners on autonomous driving projects
Published 3 conference papers on efficient neural networks
Teaching assistant for Digital Signal Processing course
achievements: Master's thesis received departmental excellence award
Developed mobile-optimized CNN achieving 25% speedup with comparable accuracy
Samsung Scholarship recipient for academic excellence
Contributed to open-source edge AI framework with 500+ GitHub stars
